room_title: Escape room "Espionage" by 5 Wits in Syracuse
review: My kids(10 and 13) love W-wits. This was our second time here, and we've been to the one in Syracuse too. We did 20,000 leagues under the sea, which probably was my least favorite of the 4 we've done, but it's still a good time. The staff is really good about making sure that all of the kids get a chance to participate... since we had a small group, the parents ended up helping out too. My kids are dying for them to open up a place in Philly.

room_title: Escape room "Espionage" by 5 Wits in Syracuse
review: I did the epsionage adventure with my friends, it was very fun!! It is interactive and inclusive for everyone involved. Also, our guide Katie was great and funny! She helped us through the different rooms and made it an exciting attraction! I would recommend going here.

room_title: Escape room "Espionage" by 5 Wits in Syracuse
review: My friends and and I went on the espionage adventure and we all had a great time! Our guide was lively and hilarious and made the entire experience entertaining. I felt immersed in the action, as if all of the events were actually happening. Can't wait to go back and complete their other adventure!

room_title: Escape room "Espionage" by 5 Wits in Syracuse
review: On Sunday you can do both experiences for 23 dollars. So basically you choose your theme you get a guide and you might end up with other strangers in your group. You start in a room and then you have to figure out how to get out of it. I recommended people of all ages to try it. There are times that you will have to crawl, and jump over things in the espionage games, and it was so worth it!

room_title: Escape room "Espionage" by 5 Wits in Syracuse
review: Really fun, especially when you are lucky enough to end up in a game with only your friends. It's immersive and interactive and it challenges you with puzzles and trying to beat the clock. You really do have to rely on your wits to figure things out. The only drawbacks that I could see is that sometimes you end up with a group of strangers which can be fun, but it depends who you end up with.
